data.title: Clone Army
data.description: Change yourself could be tough, but this is not True for python variables. In this project, you are expected to use 'variables' to enlarge your army.
data.mission: Your are a scientist in charge of producing clone army to defense your world. Your enemy is overwhelming, you need to double your army!
data.coding: Write an expression or a formular to double the 'troops_amount' value above.

data.title: Lava Adventure
data.description: The goal in this mission is learning how to organize different actions to get through the lava valley.
data.mission: Ola is being trapped in the lava valley! Your mission is to help him out of there!
data.tips: Compose a group of actions to instruct Ola walking through it. ONE line ONE action only, available actions including:

data.title: Missing Bricks
data.description: List is a very common used data type, in this project you will learn how to change list item value using an intuitive way!
data.mission: Ola needs to reach the door across the broken bridge, help him repair the bridge!
data.tips: in bridge stone list, 1 repesents existing conrnerstone, 0 repesents blank space. So, when all the 0 change to 1, you would pass!
data.coding: Change odd elements of the list to 1
data.walk: Now, press right arrow key to move player

data.title: TEMPLATES
data.description: Professionally designed highly customizable PrimeReact application templates to get started in no time.

data.title: ACCESSIBILITY
data.description: Fully accessible and in compliance with Section 508 standards.

data.title: PRO SUPPORT
data.description: With the exclusive services of Pro account, you no longer need to post your questions in the community forum and your issues to community issue tracker.

data.title: PRODUCTIVITY
data.description: Allocate your valuable time on business logic rather than dealing with the complex user interface requirements.

data.title: COMMUNITY
data.description: Join PrimeReact community to become a part of an active, vibrant and growing open source foundation.

data.title: MOBILE
data.description: Enhanced mobile user experience with touch optimized responsive design elements.
